name: BLIMPERS | Strategy + Combat + Blimp Stuff
description:
Use a mouse or touchscreen to navigate, fire and steer. During combat, you can also use Z to fire.

X marks the spot! You're in command of a blimp full of thieves for my Ludum Dare 39 game, designed, animated, scored and written from scratch in 72 hours.

Visit www.travisrootsofar.com for the rest of my stuff!

Thanks for playing!
